projects.title: Movie Overview Search Engine
projects.description: Web app built with React, styled components, Vercel and TMDB API for displaying detailed information on the latest and trending movies with features such as infinite scrolling and debounced search.

projects.title: News app
projects.description: Web app built with React, css modules, EmailJS, Vite.JS, Vercel and news API for visualizing the most relevant and important news of the moment, full responsive web design.
